alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia; Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Southern Brevard; Inland Volusia; Mainland Northern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Northern Lake County; Orange; Osceola; Seminole; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 1:23AM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Seminole, southern Lake, northern Brevard, Orange, southeastern Volusia and northern Osceola Counties through 200 AM EDT... At 121 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms as well as strong thunderstorm outflow winds ahead of the storms along a line extending from near Klondike Beach to 8 miles southwest of Mascotte. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orlando, Deltona, Kissimmee, Sanford and Titusville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
